Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "This will automatically claim and close a task in one command. You can specify an optional close message if you wish otherwise the task will be closed with the default done message of 'Automatic Discard By Command'.\\r\\n\\r\\nYou can also discard multiple tasks at one time. This will claim and close each one in order as above. You can also supply an optional close message.\\r\\n\\r\\nAs with the done or finish commands, this command will send an alert to the TAS chatline."

"+tas discard 5\\r\\n12:34 [TAS] \\"\<#5/New\> closed by Numpty: Automatic Discard By Command!\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+tas discard 5 6 7 8\\r\\n12:34 [TAS] \\"\<#5/New\> closed by Numpty: Automatic Discard By Command!\\"\\r\\n12:34 [TAS] \\"\<#6/New\> closed by Numpty: Automatic Discard By Command!\\"\\r\\n12:34 [TAS] \\"\<#7/New\> closed by Numpty: Automatic Discard By Command!\\"\\r\\n12:34 [TAS] \\"\<#8/New\> closed by Numpty: Automatic Discard By Command!\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+tas discard 5 'This is impossible. Closing.\\r\\n12:34 [TAS] \\"\<#5/New\> closed by Numpty: This is impossible. Closing.\\""
"[+\|!]tas discard 5\\r\\n[+\|!]tas discard 5 6 7 8\\r\\n[+\|!]tas discard 5 'This task is pointless.\\r\\n[+\|!]tas discard 5 6 7 8 'This task is pointless."
